name: NeoGAF Pro Dark
description: Tasteful updates to NeoGAF, for the discerning gentlemen or lady gaffer. Soothing dark tones, with hints of color sprinkled throughout. Feel free to leave feedback here, or via PM to sky on NeoGAF. ** IMPORTANT! ** Be sure to enable NeoGAF's built-in dark theme, in order to get the proper icon colours!
